::Grimmler::

Grimmler growls at Cybershark. He didn't like the bot's attitude one bit. 
"I'm here to let you in, on Kluster's orders."

He glances at the blades the Destron had. "I suggest you don't try anything. 
The defences on this ship can reduce you to slag very quickly."
